title: St Vincent de Paul Novena
description: St Vincent de Paul was a French Catholic priest who dedicated himself to serving the poor. Pray this novena for charities, horses, hospitals, leprosy, lost articles, prisoners, spiritual help, Saint Vincent de Paul Societies, and volunteers.

days.prayer:
üì± 

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

O Glorious Saint Vincent de Paul, the mention of your name suggests a litany of your virtues, humility, zeal, mercy, and self-sacrifice. It also calls to mind the wonderful charitable organizations that you established for works of mercy. The Church gratefully remembers your promotion of the priesthood. Inspire me and all Catholics in their service to the poor, whether they are poor materially or spiritually. O Lord, give us the grace that You bestowed upon Your humble servant St. Vincent de Paul to relinquish the temptation of material things so that we may live a life of generous service, not counting the cost. (mention request here‚Ä¶) Amen.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be St Vincent de Paul, pray for us!

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.
